title: Painfully Slow Client Download?
body:
Bringing this over to the help & support forum:

After a long absence of playing League of Legends and coming back to attempt to play, I'm faced with downloading the new client which seems to be an unsurmountable task. I've spent many hours downloading only to reach 10%. After doing some reading about other with this issue, I have tried closing and re-opening as admin, which seems to be worse.

As I'm typing this my download speed is dropped to 65 kbps and dropping. On speed-test my internet currently achieves a 35 Mbps download speed.

Does anybody have any tips on how I can get this downloaded with less than 24 hours of PC runtime?

Thanks guys

replies.body: Hmmmm you might be able to bump up your download speeds a bit by switching to a hardwired connection, but if that isn't possible let's also make sure to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Something might be configured a little odd for League, so make sure to check those and let me know if nothing helps.
it took me 8 hours to download and it looks like it'll take another 8 to patch :/
Same here, my speed-test it shows 50 Mbps download speed but yet for the league downloads (I haven't launched the client since 3/22/2017 btw) is at 73.7 Kbps and going down.....
